type.name: T:Elysium.Converters.ThicknessPositiveToNegativeConverter
type.summary: Changes the sign of the specified border sides to opposite.

method.name: M:Elysium.Converters.ThicknessPositiveToNegativeConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
method.summary: Changes the sign of the specified border sides to opposite.
method.param: A target type. The value is ignored.
Converter's parameter. Has to be a string and can be one of the next values: "Left", "Top", "Right", "Bottom". The value corresponds to the side of the border, which is used in calculations.
Language and local parameters used in converter. The value is ignored.
method.returns: The value of the type , which value for the any side of the border is equal to absolute , but the sign is changed to opposite. If there is a failure during method execution, following value will be returned DependencyProperty.UnsetValue.
